verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudu chesina paniyaiyunnamu 1, Kristunandu ayana chesina paniyaiyunnamu 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adamu nibandhananu bhangamu chesina Doshamu valana marana dhasyamulo nundaga 2 Devuni kumarudu gottepillayai 2 Pranamichi prayaschittamu chesenu 1{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Israyelu aiguptu dasyamulo nundi Nitturpulato mulugu liducu morrapettaga Paralokamu nundi digivacci devudu Vidipinnchi varini nadipinnchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aparadhamulache papamulache chachina varamai Ugrata patrulamai yuntimi Devudu tana maha prema cheta Kristuto kuda bratikinnchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni krupa mahadaisvaryamunu batti Raktamu dwara aparadhamulanu kshamiyinnchenu Devuni chittamayina sankalpamunu batti Tana svasthyamuga yerparachenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Durasthulaina manala kristuyesu nandu Raktamu valana samipastuluga chesenu Madyapu godanu padagotti manala Israyelutho yekamu chesenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristuyesu mukhyamaina mularayiyai yundaga Apostalulu pravaktala punadipai Parishuddhalayamuga devuni vasamuga Atmamulamuga kattabaducunnamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deva nive ma kummarivi jigatavanti varamu mamu Ni hastamulato ni polikalo rupunichi Manyi ghatamulalo mahimaishvaryamu nimpi Mahima nonduchunna deva sthotramu{/lang-eng}
